summary: A hook that automatically aligns the device of inputs and model parameters before a forward pass, optionally moves the parameters (and buffers) back to a storage location after the computation, and can also ensure the output resides on the same device as the input or place submodules on a target device during initialization.
business_intent: Enable efficient utilization of limited GPU memory by dynamically moving model weights to the appropriate execution device only when needed, supporting largeâ€‘scale model inference or training with minimal memory footprint.
